attributes.action: Have the national minimum wage at £7.50 per hour.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.gov.uk/national-minimum-wage-rates

http://www.livingwage.org.uk/

Get paid more for your labour. You are worth it.
attributes.background: Currently the minimum wage for people over 21 is £6.50 per hour. This is hardly a liveable wage. The government has promised to replace this with a national minimum wage of £7.20 starting in April of 2016. However, this is still much lower than the  minimum £9.05 per hour wage Londoners deserve.
